description.en: A compact lunch/bento bag with a structured shape and easy carry handle. Features a zip-around opening and an organized interior—ideal for lunch boxes, containers, and daily essentials. OEM/ODM customization available for fabric (including recycled options), size, logo, lining, pockets, zippers & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 便携午餐包/便当包，包型挺括，配手提便于携带。拉链全开结构，内部更易整理，适合放便当盒、餐盒与日常小物。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、尺寸、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金与包装等。

en: Outer: Polyester / Nylon / canvas-like fabric (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：涤纶/尼龙/类帆布面料（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
内里：涤纶（可定制；可选易清洁内里）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
提手：加固织带提手（可定制）

en.Opening: Zip-around wide opening for easy access
en.Interior: Main compartment + mesh pocket (optional) + small organizer pocket (optional)
en.Use Case: Lunch box, bento, meal prep container, daily carry
en.Customization: Fabric, color, logo, lining, pocket layout, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.内部结构: 主仓 + 网袋（可选）+ 小收纳袋（可选）
zh.适用场景: 午餐便当、餐盒、日常收纳
zh.可定制: 面料配色、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
